featured.text: A typical room of a capsule hotel is roughly the length and width of a single bed, with sufficient height for a guest to crawl in and sit up on the bed.
Mary is a typical left-brained learner.
Writing term papers and giving oral reports are typical course _____ for college students.
The results of this survey are not reliable because the people it questioned were not a typical or _____ sample of the entire population that was studied.
Which of the following pictures best represents the image of a typical Maasai warrior? (A) (B) (C) (D) 36.

definition.zh_def: 典型的，代表性的，常見的
definition.en_def: Having the distinctive qualities of a particular type of person or thing.
definition.example: She wore a typical outfit for the summer.
